titleStmt.title: A declaration from the Right Honourable, the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, presented to His Excelleney [sic] Sir Thomas Fairfax, in behalfe of the whole city ingenerall [sic]; concerning the present marching in of the army under his Excellencies command. Also, the gallant answer of His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, touching the Honourable City of London. Likewise the articles of the treaty, agreed upon betwixt the city and the armie.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

titleStmt.title: A declaration from the Right Honourable, the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, presented to His Excelleney [sic] Sir Thomas Fairfax, in behalfe of the whole city ingenerall [sic]; concerning the present marching in of the army under his Excellencies command. Also, the gallant answer of His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, touching the Honourable City of London. Likewise the articles of the treaty, agreed upon betwixt the city and the armie.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
